title: Looking for other beginners.
body: Yeah hey so i really like playing lol but im not very good and heaps of ppl are super mean so im not big on playing pop, but i really want to. looking for some people who want to form a friendly team to play pvp with. I usually top or mid as irelia :)

replies.body:
I'm happy to join u in some PVP games normal or ranked.
I main Shen top.
Hey I'm always down for some normals if you are keen ðŸ˜Š
toss me an invite if you'd like username's KamiShima, I'll be home at like 4ish
